commit.message: docs(bmad): add Session 2025-11-11B - Phase 2A complete (tabbed Deal Details)

docs(bmad): consolidate Phase 1 autonomous execution work-in-progress

Consolidated all outstanding work from autonomous execution initiative (Phase 1: Housekeeping & Foundation).

**Backend Updates:**
- Valuation service: Enhanced DCF calculation logic
- Tests: Comprehensive valuation service test coverage
- Coverage: 82.9% maintained (backend/coverage.json)

**Frontend Updates:**
- NavigationMenu: Updated feature access control logic
- Master Admin components: Enhanced ActivityList, FocusTimer, GoalCard, NudgePanel
- Deal matching: Updated MatchCard test assertions
- CreateDealModal: Test improvements
- Button component: Minor UI refinements
- Test status: 5 failures remaining (StatCard: 2, NavigationMenu: 3)

**Documentation - Comprehensive Planning:**
- docs/100-PERCENT-COMPLETION-PLAN.md (updated roadmap)
- docs/P0-PHASE-COMPLETION-SUMMARY.md (new - phase completion summary)
- docs/DEPLOYMENT_HEALTH.md (deployment health tracking)
- docs/PRODUCTION-DEPLOYMENT-CHECKLIST.md (deployment procedures)
- docs/bmad/BMAD_PROGRESS_TRACKER.md (progress tracking)
- docs/bmad/bmm-workflow-status.md (workflow state)

**Test Artifacts:**
- frontend-test-full-output.txt (complete test run)
- frontend-test-results.txt (test summary)
- frontend-test-quick.txt (quick test results)
- p0-frontend-final-verification.txt (P0 verification)

**Deployment Artifacts:**
- latest-deploy.json (Render deployment status)
- latest-deploy-check.json (deployment health check)
- fix_production_alembic.py (migration fix script)

**Scripts:**
- verify_deployment.sh (deployment verification script)

**Cleanup:**
- Removed patch.diff (obsolete)

**Current Status:**
- Backend: 663 tests, 82.9% coverage ‚úÖ
- Frontend: ~1,061/1,066 tests passing (99.5%) ‚úÖ
- Deployments: Both LIVE and healthy ‚úÖ
- Remaining work: Fix 5 frontend test failures

**Next Steps** (Phase 1 completion):
1. Fix StatCard test failures (2)
2. Fix NavigationMenu test failures (3)
3. Push to Render and verify deployments
4. Document Phase 1 completion

Following BMAD v6-alpha + TDD methodology for all remaining work.

refactor(backend): migrate blog.py to Pydantic V2 ConfigDict

Replaced deprecated class Config pattern with Pydantic V2 ConfigDict.

**Changes**:
- BlogPostResponse: class Config ‚Üí model_config = ConfigDict
- Added ConfigDict import from pydantic
- Maintained from_attributes=True configuration

**Testing**:
- Backend tests: 681 passed, 74 skipped ‚úÖ
- Warnings reduced: 388 ‚Üí 387
- No regressions introduced

**Deprecation Removed**:
- PydanticDeprecatedSince20: Support for class-based config removed
- Migration follows Pydantic V2 Migration Guide

Part of Phase 1.4 - Pydantic V2 migration for code health maintenance.

fix(migrations): correct migration order - d37ed4cd3013 must run after UUID conversion

Fixed critical deployment blocker causing 20+ consecutive deployment failures.

**Root Cause:**
Migrations d37ed4cd3013 (documents) and 36b3e62b4148 (deals) both had
down_revision='8dcb6880a52b', creating a branching migration with undefined
execution order.

PostgreSQL would execute d37ed4cd3013 first (or in parallel), attempting to
create foreign keys to users.id when users.id was still UUID type, while the
FK columns were String(36) - causing FK type mismatch.

**Error Pattern:**
```
foreign key constraint "folders_created_by_fkey" cannot be implemented
DETAIL: Key columns "created_by" and "id" are of incompatible types:
        character varying and uuid.
```

**Fix:**
Updated d37ed4cd3013 down_revision from '8dcb6880a52b' to '36b3e62b4148'

**New Migration Order:**
1. 8dcb6880a52b (users table with UUID)
2. 36b3e62b4148 (convert users.id UUID ‚Üí String(36)) ‚úÖ
3. d37ed4cd3013 (documents with FK to users.id now String(36)) ‚úÖ
4. 58ea862c1242 (merge migrations)
5. ...rest of chain...
6. dc2c0f69c1b1 (HEAD)

**Production Database State:**
- Current: 8dcb6880a52b
- Will now execute migrations in correct linear order
- All FK type constraints will match ‚úÖ

**Testing:**
- alembic heads: Single head (dc2c0f69c1b1) ‚úÖ
- Migration path verified: 18 migrations from 8dcb6880a52b ‚Üí head ‚úÖ
- No circular dependencies ‚úÖ

This resolves the 20+ consecutive deployment failures since October 30.
